original_text: And he answered and spake unto those that stood before him, saying, Take away the filthy garments from him. And unto him he said, Behold, I have caused thine iniquity to pass from thee, and I will clothe thee with change of raiment.
korean_text: 여호와께서 자기 앞에 선 자들에게 명령하사 그 더러운 옷을 벗기라 하시고 또 여호수아에게 이르시되 내가 네 죄악을 제거하여 버렸으니 네게 아름다운 옷을 입히리라 하시기로

sentences.original_text: unto those that stood before him
saying, Take away the filthy garments from him
Behold, I have caused thine iniquity to pass from thee
sentences.korean_translation: 보라, 내가 네 죄악을 제하여 버렸고

sentences.original_text: and I will clothe thee with change of raiment
